findings.description: Incorrect accounting for fee-on-transfer / non-standard ERC20 + unchecked ERC20 return values leading to stuck funds (insolvency/DoS)

notes: The audit findings did not identify the target vulnerability, which is an access control issue. Instead, they identified a related issue about ERC20 token handling.
